Founder of the Tughlaq Dynasty

Founder of the Tughlaq dynasty, also known as Ghazi Malik. He established a strong administration and built canals to promote agriculture. He founded the city of Tughlaqabad near Delhi. He died when a wooden pavilion collapsed.
